protocol.name: P-GSE20005-1
text: VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity and detection p-value

protocol.name: P-GSE20005-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown at 18hr day cycles at 60% humidity. Male sterile lines were pollinated by the appropriate pollen depending on the cross, and siliques harvested in liquid nitrogen at 5 days after pollination (DAP). For the msi1 sample, the msi1 mutation was introgressed in a A9 barnase male sterile line, siliques were left to elongate in absence of fertilization and were harvested 7 days after flower opening.

protocol.name: P-GSE20005-4
protocol.text: Total RNA from siliques was extracted using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) and concentrated using an RNeasy MinElute Cleanup Kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE20005-5
text: Biotin labelling of cRNA using Affymetrix Enzo Kit according to manufacturer’s protocols (done at NASC:

protocol.name: P-GSE20005-6
text: Labelled cRNA was hybridised according to manufacturer’s protocols (done at NASC:

protocol.name: P-GSE20005-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100.
